document_data.caption: Fi Lendicol, looking quite tarnished for a silver dragon
document_data.name: Fi Lendicol
document_data.mainbody: '''Fi Lendicol''' was a [[silver dragon]] in the [[Stonelands]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Fi Lendicol opposed the schemes of the [[red dragon]] [[Grinnsira]] in the [[Stonelands]], who was trying to raise an army out of the local goblinoids. Thus, she actively thwarted raids along the border of [[Cormyr]]. She often took [[human]] disguise, pretending to be a wizard.
document_data.Relationships: She had as constant companions the [[human]] [[ranger]] [[Dreik Lorne]] and the [[dwarven]] warrior [[Thurn]].
document_data.History: As of the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the mage [[Maris Khorna Terrabin]] had spoken to Fi Lendicol at length in the Stonelands; she mentioned that in a report for Elminster.
